title: FIT Watch Face
summary: BL3CK FACE: New Digital Watch Face for Fitness
description: A new digital face that combine ultraclear infos with design elements of professional sport-watch.Your workout is totally controlled by FIT now.Optimized for Round and Square watches (tested on LG GWatchR, LG GWatch, Asus ZenWatch, Moto360)Android Wear 5.1x CompliantWatch face features:★           This watch face is fully functional WITHOUT your mobile paired (if you want) so you can enable fit mode, leave phone home and start your workout!! ★           STEP COUNTER★           HEART RATE MONITOR★           BPM ALERT (limits setting in companion app)★           Digital time★           Wear Digital battery indicator★           Time, Date, Day and Seconds★           24 Hour switch★           Customizable LCD colors (via companion app)★           Absolute bl3ck background to preserve battery drain★           Minimal Dimmed mode to extreme battery save ★           Dimmed mode almost the same as normal viewAfter workout remember to disable "fit mode" to preserve battery drain.More•  Visit our exclusive Android Wear faces collection for Android Wear on the Play Store •  Please let us know if you like to have any other faces (analog, digital or both) to be added to our selection. Designed and crafted in Italy by Stefano&Riccardo
descriptionHTML:
A new digital face that combine ultraclear infos with design elements of professional sport-watch.
Your workout is totally controlled by FIT now.

Optimized for Round and Square watches (tested on LG GWatchR, LG GWatch, Asus ZenWatch, Moto360)
Android Wear 5.1x Compliant

Watch face features:
★ This watch face is fully functional WITHOUT your mobile paired (if you want) so you can enable fit mode, leave phone home and start your workout!!

★ STEP COUNTER
★ HEART RATE MONITOR
★ BPM ALERT (limits setting in companion app)
★ Digital time
★ Wear Digital battery indicator
★ Time, Date, Day and Seconds
★ 24 Hour switch
★ Customizable LCD colors (via companion app)
★ Absolute bl3ck background to preserve battery drain
★ Minimal Dimmed mode to extreme battery save
★ Dimmed mode almost the same as normal view

After workout remember to disable "fit mode" to preserve battery drain.

More
• Visit our exclusive Android Wear faces collection for Android Wear on the Play Store
• Please let us know if you like to have any other faces (analog, digital or both) to be added to our selection.
Designed and crafted in Italy by Stefano&Riccardo
comments: Hmm Doesn't seem to sync steps or actually relate my heart rate
Good looking and functional watch face. Only issue I have is the steps are not showing or syncing to watch face.
Reset? Can't reset steps......I just keeps counting.
I cant install to my w1 huawi watch
Not working Steps still dont reset, waste of money

Nice face, promising but no harm readings I've got 2 other watch faces on my Sony SW 3 that connect to my Adidas my coach wrist hrm. But this one just didn't connect. A real shame. Was hoping it would so I got all info in one face.
